content.raw:
There seems to be a problem with `DirIter` on Windows. The copy directory tests are failing like this:

```
9: [Wrn] [d:\jenkins\workspace\ignition_common-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64\ws\ign-common\src\PrintWindowsSystemWarning.hh:48] Failed to copy file [C:\Windows\TEMP\1200_248951200_304971200_234031200_239151200_10431/dir_to_be_copied\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\.\..] to [C:\Windows\TEMP\1200_248951200_304971200_234031200_239151200_10431]: The system cannot find the path specified.
```

I think the problem is coming from here:

#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/src/fdb04afb3d25a73c4f354bb575a6fec36d01ade2/src/FilesystemBoost.cc#lines-437
content.html:

I think the problem is coming from here:

content.raw: We should use `ASSERT_TRUE(create_and_switch_to_temp_dir(new_temp_dir));` to have control over where files are created. This way, if the test fails or is cancelled, no test files are left in random places.
content.html: We should use ASSERT_TRUE(create_and_switch_to_temp_dir(new_temp_dir)); to have control over where files are created. This way, if the test fails or is cancelled, no test files are left in random places.
